item.name: Pages
item.description: XM Pages API allows you to fetch all the live pages, or a live page by a specific URL

item.name: Get Live Pages For Specified Channels

request.name: Get Live Pages For Specified Channels

description.content: Get a list of all the live pages for the specified channels
Number of items to omit before collecting the resulting set
Total number of results
Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Number of items to omit before collecting the resulting set
Total number of results
Comma-separated list of channel IDs

response.name: Request was received but no data matches the request parameters

description.content: Number of items to omit before collecting the resulting set
Total number of results
Comma-separated list of channel IDs

response.name: Request was received but an internal error occurred.

description.content: Number of items to omit before collecting the resulting set
Total number of results
Comma-separated list of channel IDs

item.name: Get meta information about live pages

request.name: Get meta information about live pages

description.content: Get all the meta information such as name, url, channels, and SEO fields.
Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Number of records to be returned
Record pointer to get items after the specified record
Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Number of records to be returned
Record pointer to get items after the specified record
Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Number of records to be returned
Record pointer to get items after the specified record

response.name: Request was received but an internal error occurred

description.content: Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Number of records to be returned
Record pointer to get items after the specified record

item.name: Get Live Page For A Channel By URL

request.name: Get Live Page For A Channel By URL

description.content: Gets live page for the specified page URL and channel
(Required) Relative page url for which to retrieve the live page version
Comma-separated list of channel IDs

response.name: Successful operation

description.content: (Required) Relative page url for which to retrieve the live page version
Comma-separated list of channel IDs

item.name: Global Components
item.description: XM Global Components API allows you to fetch all the live global component data

item.name: Get Live Global Components For A Channel

request.name: Get Live Global Components For A Channel

description.content: Gets a list of all the live global component data for a specified channel
Comma-separated list of channel IDs

response.name: Successful operation

description.content: Comma-separated list of channel IDs

response.name: Request was received but an internal error occurred

description.content: Comma-separated list of channel IDs

item.name: Menu
item.description: XM Menu API allows you to fetch menus and their items

item.name: Get Live Menu For A Channel

request.name: Get Live Menu For A Channel

description.content: Gets live menu of the specified channel along with all its menu items
ID of a specific menu item, associated with a live menu
ID of parent menu item, associated with a live menu, to retrieve its sub-menu items
Depth to traverse when returning menu items
Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Name of a specific menu item, associated with a live menu

response.name: Successful operation

description.content: ID of a specific menu item, associated with a live menu
ID of parent menu item, associated with a live menu, to retrieve its sub-menu items
Depth to traverse when returning menu items
Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Name of a specific menu item, associated with a live menu
ID of a specific menu item, associated with a live menu
ID of parent menu item, associated with a live menu, to retrieve its sub-menu items
Depth to traverse when returning menu items
Comma-separated list of channel IDs
Name of a specific menu item, associated with a live menu

response.name: Request was received but an internal error occurred

description.content: ID of a specific menu item, associated with a live menu
ID of parent menu item, associated with a live menu, to retrieve its sub-menu items

fabric's Experiences (formerly known as XM) enables you to design, implement, and optimize omnichannel e-commerce experiences, without having to code. With XM, you can easily add parent and child categories through our intuitive UI to create your website navigation, and seamlessly integrate with our APIs    for dynamic navigation rendering on your store front. In addition, developers can implement agile design by creating reusable design components and use one set of data and APIs for every channel.

Contact Support:
 Email: support@fabric.inc
